page.title: 07A SURVEY OF CHEQUERBENT
page.content: {HEATING} 99% of homes have full central heating 82.5% heat by gas,11% by electricity, 4% heat by coal,1% by oil. {CONSUMER DURABLES} 100% have television,46% have video tape recorder,82% have a food freezer, 31% have a microwave oven,95% have a telephone. {SPORT} The most popular sport is{football. 64% enjoy watching sport but only 39% take part in any sport.37.5% use Westhoughton sports centre regularly. {LIBRARY 72.5% are members of Westhoughton library. {NEWSPAPERS} The most popular is the Bolton Evening News and the least popular is the News of the World.
